price: 18. Masaajidda (iyo dhulkoo dhan) waxaa leh Allaah keliya, ee ha kula baryina (caabudina) Alle cid kale.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-masājida lillahi falā tadʿū maʿa al-lahi aḥadan
